B_KOM_NOT_FOUND.title: URL not found
B_KOM_NOT_FOUND.message: The HTTP request returned a 404 status. See log for details.

B_KOM_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.title: Unauthorized call to URL
B_KOM_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.message: The HTTP request returned a 403 status. See log for details.

B_KOM_INTERNAL_ERROR.title: Internal server error
B_KOM_INTERNAL_ERROR.message: The HTTP request returned a 500 status. See log for details.

B_KOM_UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: HTTP unknown error
B_KOM_UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: The HTTP request returned an unusual status. See log for details.

F_KOM_MISSING_ARGUMENT.title: Missing argument
F_KOM_MISSING_ARGUMENT.message: A method is missing arguments. See log for details.

F_KOM_INIT_FAILED.title: No CSRF token
F_KOM_INIT_FAILED.message: Local session will not be allowed to perform some server calls. See log for details.

F_KOM_XHR_ERROR.title: Communication error
F_KOM_XHR_ERROR.message: An XHR request as failed. See log for details.
